# Description for Welcome to my website!

I am Ramya and currently pursuing my Master's in Biomedical Engineering at Case Western Reserve University. I have prior experience working in the roles of development engineer and machine learning engineer. My research interest lies in the field of orhopaedic engineering and I see myself working in this field in the future, promoting and driving innovations to improve health-care for people.

In this website, I will be publishing some of my work from my research and analysis.
